body:
This test isn't exactly testing anything different than SAME -- perhaps modify the example to exercise this?  Maybe try:

tensor_in_sizes=[1, 5, 5, 1]
filter_in_sizes=[1, 2, 2, 1]
strides=[2, 2]

So that the expected result is that you have some padding to exercise the difference between same and valid padding.
